name: OverHeat (Kaiton, Raychop, GMonesma, Léo Dev, Do_o, Alex)
name_original: OverHeat (Kaiton, Raychop, GMonesma, Léo Dev, Do_o, Alex)
description:
This game is meant to be played with an eyetracker device, such as a tobii 4C.

Become a robot which, due to a technical failure, sees its UV light turn into a destructive laser. 

Control the laser with an EyeTracker and try to reach the factory repairer, while trying to cause the least possible disruption to the production.
